alert.note: Alert for La Crosse; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 9:54PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern La Crosse and southern Trempealeau Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 953 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Galesville, or 9 miles southeast of Arcadia, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Galesville around 1005 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Council Bay, Tamarack, Ettrick, Camp Decorah and Frenchville. People attending the Trempealeau County Fairgrounds should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for west central Wisconsin.
